dawn.speaker: Narrator
dawn.text: You wake before dawn. Your dragon is already awake, watching the first light creep over the horizon. Something in the air feels different today.

dragon_waits.speaker: Narrator
dragon_waits.text: Through your bond, you sense anticipation from your dragon. It's time for something important.

mother_calls.speaker: Mother
mother_calls.text: *She appears in the doorway, dressed in flowing robes you've never seen before* Come. There's one final piece of your inheritance.

follow_mother.speaker: Narrator
follow_mother.text: She leads you to the secret garden, to the stone circle. But now, in the pre-dawn light, you see something you missed before - symbols carved into the stones.

mother_presents.speaker: Mother
mother_presents.text: *She produces an ancient pendant from beneath her robes* This belonged to Elara. It's been passed down through generations, waiting for one worthy to wear it.

pendant_described.speaker: Narrator
pendant_described.text: The pendant is shaped like a dragon's heart, carved from a stone that seems to shimmer with inner fire. Your dragon keens softly at the sight of it.

mother_offers.speaker: Mother
mother_offers.text: By accepting this, you accept your place in the line of Dragon's Heart. You accept the responsibility to protect dragons, to run this sanctuary, to carry on Elara's mission.

choice_moment.speaker: Narrator
choice_moment.text: The weight of the moment settles over you. This is more than accepting an heirloom. It's accepting who you are.

choices.text: I accept. This is who I was born to be.
I'm ready to carry on Elara's legacy.

acceptance.speaker: Narrator
acceptance.text: As Mother places the pendant around your neck, warmth floods through you. The stone pulses once, twice, then settles into a steady glow.

dragon_reacts.speaker: Narrator
dragon_reacts.text: Your dragon throws its head back and releases a magnificent roar - not of fury, but of celebration. The sound echoes across the valley.

mother_blessing.speaker: Mother
mother_blessing.text: *Tears streaming down her face* My child... you are now the guardian of Dragon Haven. May your heart always burn bright, and may your bond never falter.

sun_rises.speaker: Narrator
sun_rises.text: The sun crests the horizon, bathing the stone circle in golden light. Your dragon wraps around you, and you feel the truth settle into your bones.

new_recipe.speaker: Mother
new_recipe.text: And now, the most sacred recipe of our line - Dragon's Heart Feast. Only a true guardian can prepare it. Use it well.

end_scene.speaker: Narrator
end_scene.text: You are no longer just a cafe owner. You are the Guardian of Dragon Haven, heir to Elara's legacy, bonded to a dragon who chose you before you were born. Your destiny has finally begun.
